languages.text: "Иногда замираю перед окном — будто сама лечу сквозь небесное море — и поверить не могу, что все это со мной происходит. Вы так великодушны, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! О большем нельзя и мечтать!"

traits.locale_text: "Иногда замираю перед окном — будто сама лечу сквозь небесное море — и поверить не могу, что все это со мной происходит. Вы так великодушны, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! О большем нельзя и мечтать!"
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.text: "Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"
languages.original_text: "Иногда замираю перед окном — будто сама лечу сквозь небесное море — и поверить не могу, что все это со мной происходит. Вы так великодушны, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! О большем нельзя и мечтать!"

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes I stand still in front of a window — it's as if I was flying through the starry sea on my own — and I can't believe it's happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

"Sometimes I stand still in front of a window — it's as if I was flying through the starry sea on my own — and I can't believe it's happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

"Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

"Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

"Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

"Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

languages.text: "Manchmal stehe ich am Fenster und es ist, als würde ich selbst durch das Sternenmeer fliegen. Ich kann immer noch nicht glauben, was gerade passiert. Ihr seid so großzügig, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Mehr hätte ich mir nicht erträumen können!"
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal stehe ich am Fenster und es ist, als würde ich selbst durch das Sternenmeer fliegen. Ich kann immer noch nicht glauben, was gerade passiert. Ihr seid so großzügig, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Mehr hätte ich mir nicht erträumen können!"

languages.text: « Parfois, je m'arrête devant une fenêtre et j'ai l'impression de voler moi-même à travers l'océan d'étoiles. Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que c'est la réalité. Vous êtes si {mf|généreux|généreuse}, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Je ne pourrais pas rêver mieux ! »
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

traits.locale_text: « Parfois, je m'arrête devant une fenêtre et j'ai l'impression de voler moi-même à travers l'océan d'étoiles. Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que c'est la réalité. Vous êtes si {mf|généreux|généreuse}, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Je ne pourrais pas rêver mieux ! »

languages.text: 「ときどき、ふと足を止めて窓のそばに立つと、自分が星々の海を飛んでいるみたいな気分になるんです。今でも、こんなことが自分に起きているなんて信じられません。天の{mf|君|姫}、あなた様はなんて寛大なのでしょう！これ以上のことなんて夢にも思いませんでした！」
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

traits.locale_text: 「ときどき、ふと足を止めて窓のそばに立つと、自分が星々の海を飛んでいるみたいな気分になるんです。今でも、こんなことが自分に起きているなんて信じられません。天の{mf|君|姫}、あなた様はなんて寛大なのでしょう！これ以上のことなんて夢にも思いませんでした！」

languages.text: «A veces me paro a mirar por la ventana y es como si volara por el mar de estrellas. Sigo sin poder creer que sea cierto. ¡Es muy generos{mf|o|a} conmigo, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡No podría soñar con nada mejor!».
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

traits.locale_text: «A veces me paro a mirar por la ventana y es como si volara por el mar de estrellas. Sigo sin poder creer que sea cierto. ¡Es muy generos{mf|o|a} conmigo, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡No podría soñar con nada mejor!».

languages.text: “有的时候，我会停下来站在窗前，感觉自己仿佛在繁星点点的海洋中飞翔。我还是不敢相信，这种好事居然会发生在我身上。您实在是太慷慨了，来自上界的大人！我真的别无所求！”
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

traits.locale_text: “有的时候，我会停下来站在窗前，感觉自己仿佛在繁星点点的海洋中飞翔。我还是不敢相信，这种好事居然会发生在我身上。您实在是太慷慨了，来自上界的大人！我真的别无所求！”

languages.text: "Bazen pencereden dışarıya bakıyorum da... Sanki yıldızlar denizinde yüzüyormuşum gibi geliyor. Başıma gelene inanamıyorum. Çok cömertsiniz Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}! Daha fazlasını hayal dahi edemem!"
languages.original_text: "Sometimes, I stop and stand by a window, and it's like I'm flying through the starry sea myself. I still can't believe this is happening to me. You are so generous, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! I couldn't dream of more!"

traits.locale_text: "Bazen pencereden dışarıya bakıyorum da sanki yıldızlar denizinde yüzüyormuşum gibi geliyor. Başıma gelene inanamıyorum. Çok cömertsiniz Semavi {mf|Lordum|Leydim}! Daha fazlasını hayal dahi edemem!"
